p: Dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), Dulbecco′s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM), G418, puromycin, 2′, 7′-dichlorfluorescein diacetate (DCFH-DA), Hoechst 33342, dihydroethidium (DHE), insulin (from bovine), DL-dithiothreitol (DTT), N-acetyl-Asp-Glu-Val-Asp-p-nitroanilide (Ac-DEVD-pNA), and 3-[(3-Cholamidopropyl) dimethylammonio]-1-propanesulfonate (CHAPS) were obtained from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, USA). Penicillin, MTT and streptomycin were products of Amresco (Solon, OH). NADPH was purchased from Roche (Mannheim, Germany). Fetal bovine serum (FBS) was a product of Sijiqing (Hangzhou, China). DTNB (5,5′-dithiobis-2-nitrobenzoic acid) was a product of J&K Scientific (Beijing, China). Bovine serum albumin (BSA), Trypan blue, phenylmethylsulfonyl fluoride (PMSF), and Na 3VO 4 were products of Beyotime (Nantong, China). The propidium iodide (PI) and Annexin V-FITC apoptosis assay kit was a product of Zoman Biotech (Beijing, China). HPLC grade methanol and acetonitrile were products of Merck (Darmstadt, Germany). All other chemicals used were of analytic grade.
